com.netscape.certsrv.profile

Interface IPolicyConstraint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConfigTemplate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthzRealmConstraint, BasicConstraintsExtConstraint, CAEnrollConstraint, CAValidityConstraint, EnrollConstraint, ExtendedKeyUsageExtConstraint, ExtensionConstraint, KeyConstraint, KeyUsageExtConstraint, NoConstraint, NSCertTypeExtConstraint, RenewGracePeriodConstraint, SigningAlgConstraint, SubjectNameConstraint, UniqueKeyConstraint, UniqueSubjectNameConstraint, UserSubjectNameConstraint, ValidityConstraint

    public interface IPolicyConstraint
extends IConfigTemplate
    This represents a constraint policy. A constraint policy validates if the given request conforms to the set rules.

    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$

        void validate(IRequest request)
       throws ERejectException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        ERejectException - reject the given request
